RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 12800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE SEPTEMBER 27. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AWESOME D J stalked the pace along the inside into the stretch, shifted out three wide, rallied under right handed urging to make the lead at the sixteenth pole and drew off. BALTIC FLEET pressed the pace two wide and gamely gained second. AULD LANGE SYNE made the lead soon after the start, set the pace along inside until deep stretch then was outfinished. ENJOY BASEBALL hopped at that start inched closer between horses on the far turn then came up empty. CALL WEST with the second flight three wide, gave way in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Auld Lange Syne
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Enjoy Baseball
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, middle move, between horses, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Call West
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 3 wide, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome D J
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, shifted 3 wide, upper stretch, late burst, clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Adena Springs & Mr. & Mrs. Richard S. Kaster

ENTRY.NAME: Baltic Fleet
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, gained second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 94. Claiming Purse 24300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 27 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000 (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IRISH UNITY pressed the pace two wide through the turn while hung out in the five path, made the lead at the top of the stretch, drifted in despite left handed urging to the two path nearing the furlong marker and drew off under strong handling. THRU THE VINE never far back, rallied through deep stretch outside rivals in the seven path and got up for second. DOCTOR WU allowed to settle, closed rapidly inside rivals in the four path into the stretch, steadied nearing the furlong marker, altered course to the six path then was outfinished. MAS CHIKILIN failed to menace. EMPEROROFTHEDARK set the early pace off the rail and gave way in the stretch. THE RIDER OF DOCTOR WU LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF IRISH UNITY FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE IN UPPER STRETCH. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS UPHELD THE ORIGINAL ORDER OF FINISH.

ENTRY.NAME: Emperorofthedark
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace, drifted, 6path, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Irish Unity
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2w, 5path, drifted in near1/8p,drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Doctor Wu
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, quick move inside, 4path, steadied near1/8p,claimed foul

ENTRY.NAME: Mas Chikilin
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Thru the Vine
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late rally 7path, up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 17600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 27. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 27 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOOGIE BOOGEE broke in front, set all the pace and widened through the stretch under a strong hand ride to win as much the best. NOT A WILD BRAT prompted the pace two wide, had her heels clipped past the half mile marker, kept pressure into the stretch then was no match while second best. BISCAYNE BAY vied for the lead along the inside into the turn, swung wide giving up ground then came on again late in the eight path. NORTHERN JOURNEY close up from the start, loomed boldly three wide on the turn then was outfinished. PROPHETESS offered a mild bid along the rail into the stretch then leveled off. PISTOL PACKIN BOS with the second flight two wide, went evenly. BEEBLEGEE failed to menace. CUT RATES drifted in clipping heels with NOT A WILD BRAT past the half mile pole causing her to stumbled badly and unseated her rider. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN BUT TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Prophetess
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move inside, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Biscayne Bay
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, swung wide, lost ground, came again 8path

ENTRY.NAME: Beeblegee
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Pistol Packin Bos
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 2 wide, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Boogie Boogee
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pressured pace, full of run, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Not a Wild Brat
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, heels clipped 1/2p, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Cut Rates
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted in,clipped heels,stumbled,lost jockey,past 1/2p, walk off

ENTRY.NAME: Northern Journey
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, loomed boldly 3 wide turn, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 24300. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 27 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Races Where Entered For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).s). s).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NEBULOSA surged to a clear lead under a strong hold after a quarter, set the balance of the pace unchallenged and prevailed under strong handling. SAMMY DA BULL unhurried early, closed willingly along the rail through the stretch and finished clear for second. SERVE REVENGE COLD set the pace through the clubhouse turn along the inside, chased the pace from there and was outfinished for second in the three path. STONE COLD CAT failed to menace. DEER CREEK ROAD well placed, failed to respond. KISSINGER was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Serve Revenge Cold
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Sadey David
ENTRY.COMMENT: early lead, chased, outfinished 3path

ENTRY.NAME: Nebulosa
ENTRY.COMMENT: surged clear 2 wide after 1/4, unchallenged, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Deer Creek Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Stone Cold Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Sammy Da Bull
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, closed willingly rail, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Kissinger
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 12100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 27 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TIME FOR CUPID never far back, closed rapidly four wide through the turn, made the lead at the top of the stretch and finished full of run under brisk handling to win going away. SPEEDY FIRE pressed the early pace along the inside, made the lead nearing the turn, set the pace to the top of the stretch, drifted out to the six path late and was no match for the winner. MARIMBA stalked the pace into the stretch and finished with good courage in the seven path. V K STAR went evenly. MAGESTAL BASTIDA passed tiring rivals inside. TERRIFIC LADY set the pace for five sixteenths of a mile, kept pressure into the stretch then weakened. IRON WILMA was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Time for Cupid
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed fast, 4 wide, drew off,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Hunter Valley Farm, Jayne Johnson & John Wade

ENTRY.NAME: Marimba
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, finished well 7path

ENTRY.NAME: Speedy Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, led drifted 6path late, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Magestal Bastida
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Terrific Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: early lead, set pace 7/16pole, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Iron Wilma
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: V K Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 14900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 27 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OVER THE HILLS sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, set all the pace and widened through the stretch to win as much the best while being ride out. NOT A GAME chased the early pace, dropped back on the turn then came on again late three wide to get up for second. REINSURE advanced between rivals on the turn then was outfinished. STRIKE A BEAT vied for the lead along the inside into the stretch and faded late. KING'S MISCHIEF was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Over the Hills
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace, drew off, much the best, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Strike a Beat
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, inside, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Reinsure
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, between horses, 2wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: King's Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Not a Game
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, dropped back turn, came again, 3 wide, up place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 90. Allowance Purse 31900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of $22,000 Since January 27 Allowed 3 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Highest Earnings 2022-2023 Preferred)(Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MALICED always within striking distance, responded readily when set down in upper stretch, rallied along the rail to make the lead just past the furlong marker and drew clear under confident handling. J L'S ROCKETTE broke in front, set the pace until mid stretch then couldn't handle the winner while finishing gamely for second. MAKESCENTSTOUS pressed the pace two then three wide and was outfinished. SHEISTHEHERO failed to menace. PURITY vied for the early lead three wide and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Maliced
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed willingly inside, right handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Sheisthehero
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: J L's Rockette
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace mid stretch, held place,

ENTRY.NAME: Makescentstous
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2-3wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Purity
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 36. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KISS VALENTINA sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, widened into the stretch and prevailed under strong handling. TITEBLUEJEANS never far back, rallied through the stretch along the rail and got up for second. WEEKENDING unhurried early, closed a gap late four wide. FABULOUS CLOWN chased the winner into the stretch and was outfinished while two wide. KISS THE RED HEAD moved up three wide into the turn then failed to sustain that bid. UNEXPECTEDVALENTYN chased the winner three wide and weakened on the turn. MISS MARY JEAN bore in at the start bumping BOLD NICKY then was no factor. BOLD NICKY was bumped at the start and no threat. CATALINA was hung nine wide down the backstretch, stopped on the turn and jogged to the wire.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Mary Jean
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Urieta Johanna
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, bumped start, no factor,

ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, no threat,

ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace, widened into stretch, driving,

ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, closed gap late 4wide
